features: Great Design: Our Steamer Iron for Clothes boasts a sleek and functional design that's perfect for travelers and home use alike.
Mini & Lightweight: Its compact size and lightweight construction make it incredibly portable, ensuring you can effortlessly carry it wherever you go.
Versatile Handle: The handle of this handheld steamer can be rotated 180 degrees, making it easy to reach even the trickiest wrinkles on your garments.
Generous Water Tank: With a 100ml capacity water tank, you can steam multiple outfits without constantly refilling, saving you time and effort.

Powerful and Fast: This steamer delivers high power and heats up rapidly, providing you with quick and efficient wrinkle removal. Additionally, it offers a convenient switch to steamer mode, with steam ready to eject in just 3 seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Jawn is NICE!!!
reviews.reviewText: I really dig this steamer iron! It's so easy to use and it works great on all kinds of fabrics. I can iron and steam my clothes in one go, and it's very convenient to travel with. The 180° rotation feature is amazing, it lets me reach every corner and crease without any hassle. The steamer is also very lightweight and compact, so it doesn't take up much space in my luggage. Comes with a small travel bag. It's definitely a must-have for anyone who needs a quick and effective way to freshen up their clothes. I recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic travel iron/steamer that packs a punch!
reviews.reviewText: Super impressed with this little guy especially at this price! The head swivels out and clicks into a horizontal and then fully vertical position, or you can leave it in it's original state. Once you plug it in it heats up quick! To use the steaming function you press the steam button and within 10-20 seconds this little guy starts to shoot an impressive stream out. The reservoir is tiny which is to be expected but holds plenty of water to steam out a few garments at a time. I do wish the face plate that you use to rest the iron on physically clicked onto the iron but not a big deal at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product for travel purposes and basic everyday steaming. Does not have temperature control, so be cautious when using it on delicate fabrics and clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very aesthetically pleasing. Small so it’s very easy to travel with. Easy to set up and works well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but effective little iron
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought I was mainly ordering a steamer but to my surprise I got much more.The iron comes with a small cup to fill with water and pour into the steamer iron. The handle rotates so that you can either iron on your ironing board or as a hand held steamer for clothes hanging up.Super easy to use straight out of the box. Just add water to the iron steamer and plug into your outlet.I was impressed how well I could iron my clothes to remove wrinkles out quickly.The small iron will be a great travel essential and the price was good for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightning fast heat up!
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is very compact. It comes with a little measuring cup to add water to the reservoir. If you have hard water I would recommend using distilled water to lengthen the life of your appliance. The cord is a heavy braided cord that seems very thick and durable. I was shocked at how quickly this steam iron heats up. After plugging it in, it starts to heat up immediately and within 10 seconds it was already hot to the touch. You can use it horizontally as an iron, or vertically as a steamer. I opted to use it as a steamer. My closet is packed so tightly with clothes that if my blouses hang in there for too long they get wrinkly. This steamer did amazing at quickly taking the wrinkles out. With the steam button turned out it shoots out heavy puffs of steam and I could watch the wrinkles fall out before my eyes,This is great for traveling because it's so compact. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Lightweight.Portable.Cons:Lack of heat control.Other thoughts:I have used it during travel to keep my clothes nice and ironed. It is great that it is small and portable. It is a bit too simple, however, as you cannot control the temp. So be careful when using it on certain fabrics (i normally put a thin fabric between the iron and the delicate to avoid any problems.Otherwise, a very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's smaller than I thought, but I'm totally happy with this travel iron. The design and color are great, and it's so comact to make it perfect for travel to get your shirts and pants out of wrinkles. The iron comes with a little cup to put water in and a cover to place the iron down on when hot. The greatest thing is it gets hot almost immediately after plugging it in. The iron works perfectly, not just for travel, I use it at home as well. It's so small I'm just putting it in my dresser drawer.
